DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Blood stomach & oesophagus patient variceal bleed often obscure endoscopic view & make endoscopic intervention difficult perform . Erythromycin , motilin agonist induces gastric empty . The aim study assess effect Erythromycin endoscopic visibility outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Erythromycin Before Endoscopy Patients With Variceal Bleeding : A Randomized , Double-Blind Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : Adult patient liver cirrhosis stigma chronic liver disease present hematemesis melena within previous 12 hour randomize double blind trial receive either 125 mg erythromycin placebo 30 minute endoscopy . The primary end point endoscopic visibility assess objective scoring system & mean endoscopy duration . Secondary end point need repeat endoscopy blood transfusion within 24 hour first endoscopy , endoscopy related complication length hospital stay .
